name: Upload new DocuGenerate documents to Dropbox
description:
Every time a new document is created in [DocuGenerate](https://www.docugenerate.com/?utm_source=make&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=template_16555), Make will automatically upload that document to a Dropbox folder you specify. 
This workflow provides seamless document backup and sharing through Dropbox integration.
Created by DocuGenerate. [Contact us](mailto:support@docugenerate.com) if you have any questions.
